document.full_text: colorado avalanche captain adam foote will retire at the end of the nhl season, bringing down the curtain on a 20-year career that included two stanley cups and an olympic gold medal, the team said on friday.
document.title: avalanche captain foote to retire after 19 seasons
lines_and_colors: colorado avalanche captain adam foote will retire at the end of the nhl season, bringing down the curtain on a 20-year career that included two stanley cups and an olympic gold medal, the team said on friday.
